title: How TO - Online Offline Detection

metadata.description: Learn about How TO - Online Offline Detection with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Learn how to detect whether the browser is online or offline with JavaScript.
Offline Detection
The
onLine
property of the
Navigator
object returns a Boolean value that specifies whether the browser is in online or offline mode:
Example
Find out whether the browser is online:
var x = "Is the browser online? " + navigator.onLine;

Read more about the Navigator Object in our
JavaScript Navigator Tutorial
.
